title: Sona & Taric
body:
Sorry - unplayed - killed.
Taric - unplayed - ignored.
Rito pls.
Wrong way to go.

replies.body: You keep your mouth off taric , rito should leave him be, not my fault people don't play him but he functions as a support in the best ways
He's been in for a rework along with Zilean and Alistar sometime down the line anyway.

ugh, I hate playing adc against a Zilean support. I know he isn't op, but if your own support doesn't know what they're doing and can't heal, shield, or counter poke in response to him, you're just perma-zoned

True, he can be annoying and in my experience, (maybe I've just gone up against really bad Zileans), all they typically can do is be annoying and dive-bomb you. He's pretty vulnerable once he's done with his Q so, personally, hard engages or smart pokes are going to give him a hard time.
which is why you need a competent support to go mess with Zil for bombing you.

True.

To be honest I found his potential for zoning annoying when I'd started out but then I started playing him myself. I think that helped me figure out his limits quite alot.
I was under the impression that they'd only be visually updating him (eventually) not messing with his kit, like Alistar is on the pbe right now

Honestly I'm not sure.

They made a mention of reworking him, Alistar and Zilean ages ago so maybe they've decided to keep Taric's to a VU?
To be fair though, people do actually play those two.
rahter as damage dealing tank with some supportive traits, besides that hes old and rusty
